meta.title: Contact
meta.description: Get in touch about roles, systems, or ideas.

sections.learningNote: I value learning as much as outcomes. If you’ve reviewed my work and have a thought to share — whether or not there’s interest right now — I’m always open to hearing from you.
sections.intro: If you’d like to talk about a role, a system, or an idea, feel free to reach out. Whether you’re exploring something early or refining an existing product, I’m always open to a thoughtful conversation.
sections.workWithMe: I work at the intersection of operations, systems, and software — leading and building products where clarity, feedback, and explainable decisions matter.
sections.auroraNote: If you’re curious about Aurora, I’m happy to talk at a high level about its concepts and direction — the patterns, ideas, and product thinking behind a more conversational approach to software.
sections.confirmationMessage: Thanks for reaching out — I appreciate it. I’ll review your message and get back to you soon.
